snippet: An unannounced trip by President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi came as Egypt continued to face criticism in the investigation of the fatal crash of a Russian plane last month.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, who has declined to affirm American and British assertions that downing of Russian plane over resort town of Sharm el Sheikh was caused by bomb, visits site for first time.
lead_paragraph: An unannounced trip by President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi came as Egypt continued to face criticism in the investigation of the fatal crash of a Russian plane last month.

headline.main: Egyptian President Makes First Visit to Sharm El Sheikh Since Russian Crash
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Egypt: President Visits Stricken Resort
